h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - The Duskveil
content: Finally, the Duskveil can also performing a dashing charge attack, running past you back and forth like a bull up to four times.

Finally, the Duskveil can also performing a dashing charge attack, running past you back and forth like a bull up to four times.
